website_summaries.verdict: A charger that works over a long distance even when the weeds get high.
pros: Indicator light shows when charge is working
Gives you plenty of distance if you want to run multiple strands of hot wire
Works for large and small animals
cons: This unit can be loud and is known to deliver a popping noise

customer_reviews.title: it is not fun. You will curse and it will be loud
customer_reviews.text: This is the real deal. I have a garden which was under constant attack from groundhogs, squirrels and raccoons. I strung up 4 wires around the garden box, drove 3 8ft ground rods, and was off to the races. More aptly, the raccoons were off to the races. I also have shocked myself and let me tell you, it is not fun. You will curse and it will be loud.
customer_reviews.author: Leif Garrett

customer_reviews.title: Heifers ridin' lightin'
customer_reviews.text: I don't know what happened but after a week it now "clicks" probably twice a second. If it shorts out it sounds like a .22 popping. And it killed a cow. So yeah, it works.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Boisselle

customer_reviews.title: For Repelling Bears
customer_reviews.text: We use it for an electric mat to repel black bears. We needed something powerful because they are large animals with thick fur. Not shown in the photo: we later attached strips of foil to the wires with peanut butter smeared on them so the bears would touch with their nose/mouth and eventually learn to avoid our property.
customer_reviews.author: lotsamice

customer_reviews.title: 2 Joules is enough to jump the gap from the poles to your hands and make you scream bad words in front of the children
customer_reviews.text: FYI: do NOT put both hands on the unit while operating in full sunlight to shade it so you can see if the activity light is flashing. 2 Joules is enough to jump the gap from the poles to your hands and make you scream bad words in front of the children. Also American Guinea Hogs have tough skin and lots of hair, much tougher than your average market breed, and laugh at .5 joules. This is what it took to get them to notice.
customer_reviews.author: Blanche Wattenberg

customer_reviews.title: looks like a good fencer
customer_reviews.text: I bought this more for a back up fencer, I had another brand and I felt the life of them was not what was expected, and want to try another brand to see if they would last longer, I was getting an average of 2 years out of the old brand, I had a smaller unit of this brand and it works but I like the higher powered units they seem to keep the cattle and animals in better and if any weeds or grass are on the fence, it seem to work even if things are not perfect,
customer_reviews.author: B D

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install not sure how weather proof it is so I stuck it inside a plastic cover made from an old pump up garden sprayer cut the top off of and turned it upside down. I gives a hard jolt I know from direct experience took a jolt through my hand my finger hurt for a good 5 minuets. Vegetation does not easily short it out I had some grape vines touch the hot wire but it had enough power to still produce a spark when I tested it with a grounded wire.
customer_reviews.author: GARY

customer_reviews.title: This Charger Rocks !!
customer_reviews.text: This charger rocks !! I don't have to worry about weeds touching it. That saves me a lot of trouble not having to regularly walk the wire to clear it. This dood pops a hog and changes his direction !
customer_reviews.author: MyOwnSelf

customer_reviews.title: Working good. When well grounded to earth i have been ...
customer_reviews.text: Working good. When well grounded to earth i have been shocked and chest muscles convulsed. 7000 volts reading. Have overhead rain protection just 12" shelf update still working one year later
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: THIS FENCE CHARGER WORKS.
customer_reviews.text: THIS CHARGER IS STRONG ENOUGH TO KEEP MY DOGS INSIDE MY FENCED YARD. I TRIED SMALLER POWERED CHARGERS AND THEY DON'T GET THE JOB DONE BUT THIS CHARGER STOPS THEM COLD. DOGS ARE TUFF AND A LIGHT OUTPUT WILL NOT DO THE TRICK. THIS ONE WORKS.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Lurie

customer_reviews.title: DOA
customer_reviews.text: Got this to replace a medium duty Fi-Shock. Checked the Fi-Shock output to have a comparison. Disconnected the Fi-Shock and hooked up the Zareba EAC50M it was dead on arrival. No output.
customer_reviews.author: Dnewt

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to install. Works great. Enough of kick to keep the cows and pigs in. It even gets through all my Scottish highland bull’s hair 😂. Very happy with this purchase so far.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer E

customer_reviews.title: Keeps them in line
customer_reviews.text: After a hit or two, it keeps them away from the fence and in line. To anyone wh says cruelty, please, pay the repair bills or legal fees that animals cause and rack up.
customer_reviews.author: Lizybeff

customer_reviews.title: Very strong.
customer_reviews.text: My fence tester only reads up to 7000 volts, so its that or better. Great product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew R

customer_reviews.title: poor indicator light
customer_reviews.text: There is an indicator light but it is almost impossible to see its status. Coupled with the fact the audible click sound is very faint. Having said that it performs very well and delivers a really good shock
customer_reviews.author: Daniel V.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Have used it 2 summer grazing seasons (5 months) ...works perfectly
customer_reviews.author: Stuart McConnell

customer_reviews.title: Zappity do-dah, zappity ay!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is kicking-out about 10,000 volts and hitting it strong. The reason they use pulse is so that nothing gets locked onto the wires and instead has a chance to get away. This is actually a very good and safe thing. My previous continuous current charger grabbed and held a few owls and birds that I'd have rather been released. The pulse is safer and will still blast the coyotes or other game without as much danger of killing. The indicator light can only be seen at night but with each click you get a little noise and so you know it's working. Very happy with this product!
customer_reviews.author: Z. Reisman

customer_reviews.title: Weak.
customer_reviews.text: Second unit after returning first for not working at all. I have a tester and the pulse is very weak. I have 4 acres with two strands of wire. I do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: John T.

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work
customer_reviews.text: I purchased with the 3 6ft grounding rods and it still wasn't powerful enough to keep my dog in the yard. Not sure how it works so well for other people. I'm out $170 between everything needed to set it up.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine

customer_reviews.title: wow !!
customer_reviews.text: i tried other electric fences here in texas hill country for deer and none dicouraged them.this one sends them running and they now will not get within about 50 feet of my yard i have lost many dollars of plants to them ,now they stay out. great product !!!!
customer_reviews.author: Philip Neal

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Keeps my goats an dogs in and the predators out.
customer_reviews.author: Marty

customer_reviews.title: Great fencer
customer_reviews.text: We have been using this brand for several years and really are happy with the way they hold up.
customer_reviews.author: meg

customer_reviews.title: Fence Charger
customer_reviews.text: Works good keeps the deer out of our garden, can't ask for more!
customer_reviews.author: elaine

customer_reviews.title: Impressed with this charger
customer_reviews.text: We use this to charge perimeter fence to keep range cattle out of our 24 acre horse sanctuary. It has worked well for a few months so far.
customer_reviews.author: wetarez

customer_reviews.title: Small with punch!
customer_reviews.text: Don't let the size fool you, this little thing works great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: powerful charger
customer_reviews.text: Awesome charger ! works great. I have over 30 miles of fence and it works fine. Just wish it had a digital read out of the power like my old one did. Fast shipping Hasn't killed anything yet so I recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Hanger

customer_reviews.title: Keeps cows off the fence
customer_reviews.text: Instructions on need for grounding very helpful, but it would have been helpful when ordering.
customer_reviews.author: richard E

customer_reviews.title: Good product fence charger
customer_reviews.text: It's all good, seems to be functioning properly. It would profit by having an On-Off switch. It does not burn off grass that touches the wire
customer_reviews.author: Richard Runser

customer_reviews.title: Good charger
customer_reviews.text: The horse quit testing the fence when this went up! 2 of the 3 dogs also respect it, long haired dog will dash through it, then refuses to come back through - have to go open the gate to let her out! Hoping she will quit pushing it in the first place soon, she is obviously getting shocked!
customer_reviews.author: K Hall

customer_reviews.title: Charger is strong and quite I do wish it had ...
customer_reviews.text: Charger is strong and quite I do wish it had a read out on output voltage or a brighter light, First charger I have ever had without ext. fuse..
customer_reviews.author: M B

customer_reviews.title: Very effective
customer_reviews.text: This charger works very well. The dogs really respect the fence.
customer_reviews.author: Ryley mason😊

customer_reviews.title: Good animal damage preventer.
customer_reviews.text: I just like the fact that this product has keep the deer and rabbits from my garden. I put up three strands of wire and this product can handle it with no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Travis Hocum

customer_reviews.title: I guess the bears don't like this one
customer_reviews.text: Bought this because black bears were destroying my bee hives. This thing is pushing 13 to 14 thousand volts. I guess the bears don't like this one. Thank you for such a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Big K

customer_reviews.title: I bought this unit for a Bear fence around a ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this unit for a Bear fence around a small 30 x 15 foot braided electric rope area around my bee hives. It definitely puts out the voltage.
customer_reviews.author: rbcsaver

customer_reviews.title: Works great for my horses!
customer_reviews.text: This works great! I have 3 separate pastures and it powers all of them. The horses got popped once and have not tough the fence since :)
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: Great electric fence box - keeps in my horses and ...
customer_reviews.text: Great electric fence box - keeps in my horses and goats, not problem. Perimeter fencing around 4 acres, 3 levels of hot wire to offer backup to my cow wire, and it all works great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Zareba EAC50M-Z AC-Powered Low-Impedence 50-Mile-Range Charger
customer_reviews.text: I use it for keeping deer out of an inclosure around our home. It has stopped the deer, is pretty powerful for the price. Lightning arresters both on the fence and electrical input are strongly recommended. Since using the arresters, I have not lost a charger to lightning strikes.
customer_reviews.author: Keith M

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Plug and play, circles 23 acres and keeps cattle back off fence.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Love it so far thought it might be a little ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it so far thought it might be a little strong for dogs but I touched it just right to make you not want to do it again be it man or dog
customer_reviews.author: Ronald E. Wilkerson

customer_reviews.title: Great fence charger
customer_reviews.text: Great fence charger. We use it to protect our honey bee hives from bear attacks. We have many bear sightings in the area but to date no attempts to break into our bee yard. I would recommend this item to others.
customer_reviews.author: Gary L. Garvin

customer_reviews.title: This charger is hot as Hades on my 1/4 mile of polytape fence :-D
customer_reviews.text: This charger is hot as Hades on my 1/4 mile of polytape fence. I get complimented by any farmer that accidentally zaps themselves on it. :-D It's hot at 2 joules, but make sure to add up your total amount of fence (if you have a 1 mile perimeter, but 4 strands of electric, then you have 4 miles of fence.) Will update review if the durability changes.
customer_reviews.author: April C.

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! So far so good! Goats are staying in and it’s hot!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Emge

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: I replaced an older weaker fencer with the Zareba EAC50M-Z 50 mile fencer. Couldn't be happier. Couldn't keep my goats in their lot. With this charger keeping the goats in the pasture is not a problem. Also keeps the Black Bears out of my Honey Bee hives.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Foster

customer_reviews.title: Argooooooooooo!
customer_reviews.text: Is what you'll say if this hits you. Wow. Nailed me through a winter coat.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Miller

customer_reviews.title: good zap when I hit the wire by accident
customer_reviews.text: Works so far, good zap when I hit the wire by accident.
customer_reviews.author: Fire 304

customer_reviews.title: Works good.
customer_reviews.text: Put around garden to stop varmints. I actually got to eat some corn this year. I'm delighted! 😂 Rigged carefully it is a good barrier against raccoons.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: This fence charger is very easy to install and works exactly as it should.
customer_reviews.author: Danny Moore

customer_reviews.title: Very good fencer
customer_reviews.text: To this point, the fencer has worked fine. We move our cattle a lot during the winter from field to field.c fencer has made all of the moves.
customer_reviews.author: Darlaquilts

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are great. We have 5 on our property. Great power out put.
customer_reviews.author: David Wells

customer_reviews.title: 220-110 Voltage Convertor for this device
customer_reviews.text: Which 220 to 110 voltage converter will best suitable for this charger?
customer_reviews.author: vinod

customer_reviews.title: ouch, it works
customer_reviews.text: first installed it and couldn't get a reading with the "strobe light " reader. hard to see. checked the fence for shorts umteen times and still couldn't see any action. animals disregarded it. finally I found a ground wire touching the hot wire. Accidently got zapped and got a welt and it was sore for about 20 minuets. I have a couple of miles of fence wire going through moderate to heavy weeds and digital tester indicates 8.7 kilovolts. That works for me.
customer_reviews.author: Harold R. Lingo

customer_reviews.title: It works fine I just got hit by it today my mistake
customer_reviews.text: It works fine I just got hit by it today my mistake. It seems to keep the critters out and the lambs in.
customer_reviews.author: Richard F. Myers

customer_reviews.title: but thus far it is putting out a great charge and holding up well
customer_reviews.text: Only had in use for a few months.. but thus far it is putting out a great charge and holding up well.
customer_reviews.author: Airborne Ranger

customer_reviews.title: goats
customer_reviews.text: it is well within what is described ..the only thing is for goats i recommend something stronger due to their hair but with 6 strands 6 inches apart it will work fine for them if the only fence you have...
customer_reviews.author: Frank W.

customer_reviews.title: THE 50 MILE CHARGER IS PERFECT AND PROBABLY MORE THAN YOU WILL EVER NEED
customer_reviews.text: THE ANIMALS WILL ONLY TOUCH THE WIRE ONE TIME THE SHOCK DOES NOT INJURE THEM BUT THEY WILL NEVER FORGET.
customer_reviews.author: PETERGCOOPER

product_meta.title: Zareba EAC50M-Z AC-Powered Low-Impedence 50-Mile-Range Electric Fence Charger
product_meta.description: Protect your animals with the Zareba 50 Mile AC Low Impedance Fence Charger. This powerful 2-joule energizer controls a variety of animals, including pigs, llamas, horses, cattle, and more. Besides keeping animals in, it will also help to keep wildlife out. This 50 Mile Charger will power through heavy weeds with its strong output, although a well-kept fence line is ideal. Extreme vegetation and poly products will reduce the overall power of the fence energizer. The more material along the fence line, the harder the energizer must work to pass voltage through the line. This UL-listed energizer will plug into any standard 2 prong electrical outlet and should be protected from the elements. Built in the USA, this energizer is tested with a full load at our manufacturing facility and comes with a 2-year warranty. This warranty includes damage from lightning and can be extended to 3 years by registering online.
feature_bullets: Energizes up to 50 miles of fence
2 Year Limited Warranty including lightning damage, 3 years with registration
Built in USA Full load tested in the U.S. after manufacturing

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
